name: VICTORY RUN
description: The game is made up of 8 different Special Stages, including highways, deserts, savannas, and coastlines. Cross the finish line within the allotted stage time (plus any extra time) to successfully clear each stage. If the total time elapsed is less than the set stage time, you can progress to the next stage. Parts such as tires, gears, engines, suspension systems, and brakes can be custom fitted to the car to suit each type of race. Driving on rough courses and hitting obstacles will cause damage to individual parts, so making repairs is key.
